issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Alloy
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the Alloy here.

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description:
I want to publish my app on Apple Store. I completed all needed steps to make build and its their in XCODE -> Windows -> Archive. 

But when i am going to validate my build, i got below error.
"the bundle is invalid. new apps and updates submitted to the app store must be built with public"

So how am i going to solve this issue.

Even i tried to open build in XCODE and Archive it but still i am getting below error:
[ERROR] :     Invalid "--developer-name" value "iPhone Distribution: CybApps Development ltd. (JH5QHNV5PX)"

[ERROR] :     Invalid "--pp-uuid" value "F8F66699-2C08-49C0-B593-B709B03F4EBD"

For help, run: titanium help build

Command /bin/sh failed with exit code 1

Its very urgent to publish my app to Apple store.

Please help me to resolve this issue and i will publish my app.

Thanks
fields.summary: iOS App Distribution Fail on XCODE

comments.body:
Hello Karan! 

Are you using Xcode 5.1.1? Check this from Apple:

Starting May 15, 2014, new apps and app updates submitted to the App Store must be built with Xcode 5.1.1

Best,
Mauro

Hello Mauro,

I make build with iOS SDK 7.1 with XCODE 5.1

but still this issue comes.

I clear build and make new build but still this issue not resolved.

Please help me to solve this issue.

Thanks,
Karan

Hello Karan,
do you mind to take a look into this?

https://developer.appcelerator.com/question/161067/trying-to-archive-for-ad-hoc-but-gets-error-i-xcode---developer-name----pp-uuid

I think the second answer might help. 

Best,

Mauro

Hello!

Is this still happening to you?

Best Regards!

Hello,

I downloaded XCODE 5.1.1 and this issue solved.

Previously i have XCODE 5.1, that is why it creates problem.

This problem solved.

Thanks,
Customer installed Xcode 5.1.1 and issue was fixed.
